titles.title: Urging the Secretary of the Treasury to take certain actions under the Emergency Economic Stabilization Act of 2008 to protect the interests of the taxpayer, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
1/27/2009--Introduced.
Urges the Secretary of the Treasury to: (1) halt the purchase of a luxury corporate jet by Citigroup or require Citigroup to reimburse the Treasury for its cost; (2) require Troubled Assets Relief Program (TARP) recipients to spend tax dollars to help homeowners, small businesses, and others hurt by the recession; and (3) place further restrictions on TARP recipients to limit executive compensation and other benefits.
